sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.enroll_year, student.gender FROM student WHERE student.is_deleted = 0 AND (student.enroll_year = 2022 OR (student.enroll_year = 2023 AND student.gender = '女'))), agg_2022 AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_2022 FROM base WHERE base.enroll_year = 2022), agg_2023_female AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_2023_female FROM base WHERE base.enroll_year = 2023 AND base.gender = '女') SELECT (SELECT count_2022 FROM agg_2022) AS total_2022_students, (SELECT count_2023_female FROM agg_2023_female) AS female_2023_students

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射，'2022级' → 2022
根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射，'2023级' → 2023
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”映射，'女生' → '女'

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.enroll_year, student.gender FROM student WHERE student.is_deleted = 0 AND (student.enroll_year = 2022 OR (student.enroll_year = 2023 AND student.gender = '女'))), agg_2022 AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_2022 FROM base WHERE base.enroll_year = 2022), agg_2023_female AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_2023_female FROM base WHERE base.enroll_year = 2023 AND base.gender = '女') SELECT (SELECT count_2022 FROM agg_2022) AS total_2022_students, (SELECT count_2023_female FROM agg_2023_female) AS female_2023_students
